#include<stdio.h>
int arr[20+2][20+2];
int n;
int maze(int x,int y)
{
    if(x==n&&y==n)return 1;
    int t=0;
    arr[x][y]=1;
    if(arr[x+1][y]==0)t+= maze(x+1,y);
    if(arr[x-1][y]==0)t+= maze(x-1,y);
    if(arr[x][y+1]==0)t+= maze(x,y+1);
    if(arr[x][y-1]==0)t+= maze(x,y-1);
    arr[x][y]=0;
    return t;
}
int main()
{
	int i,j;
    for(i=0;i<=20;i++)
    {
        for( j=0;j<=20;++j)arr[i][j]=1;
    }
    scanf("%d",&n);
    for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
    {
        for( j=1;j<=n;++j)scanf("%d",&arr[i][j]);
    }
    printf("%d",maze(1,1));
}
